name: Roots of a Life
description:
[Game created for the GGJ23, using the themes related to “Roots” and “Destiny”. ]

Control little Robot Robit in search of the lost seed among the ruins of the TP3-R2 planet. Conquer the planet, achieve your goals and overcome all the adversities. 

* Creators: 

Hamza Ait 
Jordi Borraz 
Albert Cañas 
Ricard Ruiz 
Daniel Sánchez 
Blanca Velasco

Sound effects sourced from: All sound effects used in this game have been retrieved from FreeSound.
